languages.text: On hit with a Shield attack or with Vigilant round ({g|f:a358b39479c644748a0c3211e99f3fe5}Flechette Shot{/g}, {g|f:a2437c418d824e1b990eac368c6a9273}Fulmenary Shot{/g}, or {g|f:76e37b6d00b14fbea50c39784b768098}Doublet{/g}) wielder makes a Coercion (-40) test to make enemy Immobilized

If the wearer succeeds, the target is {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.
languages.original_text: Носитель получает +5 ко всем навыкам за каждый талант Арбитра.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer hits a target with {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g}, or {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g}, they make a Coercion test with a −40 penalty. If succeed, the target is immobilised.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g}, or {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g}, they make a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −40 penalty. If the wearer succeeds, the target is {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g}, or {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g}, they make a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −40 penalty. If the wearer succeeds, the target is {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g}, or {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g}, they make a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −40 penalty. If the wearer succeeds, the target is {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

languages.text: Takan kişi; bir hedefe {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Kalkan Çarpışı{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Çifte Mıh{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Şimşek Gibi Atış{/g} veya {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Zımbalayan Karar{/g} ile {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} −40 ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Gözdağı{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testine{/g} girer. Takan kişi testi geçerse hedef {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olur.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g}, or {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g}, they make a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −40 penalty. If the wearer succeeds, the target is {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Takan kişi; bir hedefe {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Kalkan Çarpışı{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Çifte Mıh{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Şimşek Gibi Atış{/g} veya {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Zımbalayan Karar{/g} ile vurduğunda −40 ceza puanına sahip bir Gözdağı testine girer. Takan kişi testi geçerse hedef felç olur.

Takan kişi; bir hedefe {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Kalkan Çarpışı{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Çifte Mıh{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Şimşek Gibi Atış{/g} veya {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Zımbalayan Karar{/g} ile vurduğunda −40 ceza puanına sahip bir Gözdağı testine girer. Takan kişi testi geçerse hedef felç olur.

languages.text: Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un objetivo con {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Golpe de escudo{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Doblete{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Disparo fulminante{/g} o {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Dictamen sangriento{/g}, realiza una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coacción{/g} con una penalización de −40. Si tiene éxito, el objetivo queda {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g}, or {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g}, they make a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −40 penalty. If the wearer succeeds, the target is {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador impacta a un objetivo con {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Golpe de escudo{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Doblete{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Disparo fulminante{/g} o {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Dictamen sangriento{/g}, realiza una prueba de Coacción con una penalización de −40. Si tiene éxito, el objetivo queda inmovilizado.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}盾牌猛击{/g}、{g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}双重火力{/g}、{g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}爆发射击{/g}或{g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}严酷审判{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，装备者都会进行{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}胁迫{/g}技能检定，且在此次{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}中承受-40减值。若装备者通过检定，则目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g}, or {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g}, they make a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −40 penalty. If the wearer succeeds, the target is {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}盾牌猛击{/g}、{g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}双重火力{/g}、{g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}爆发射击{/g}或{g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}严酷审判{/g}命中目标时，装备者都会进行胁迫技能检定，且在此次检定中承受-40减值。若装备者通过检定，则目标陷入定身状态。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trifft{/g} der Träger ein Ziel mit {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Schildstoß{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Doppelpatrone{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Donnernder Schuss{/g} oder {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Entsetzliche Anordnung{/g}, macht er eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Zwang{/g} mit einem Abzug von -40. Gelingt die Probe, wird das Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g}, or {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g}, they make a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −40 penalty. If the wearer succeeds, the target is {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Trifft der Träger ein Ziel mit {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Schildstoß{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Doppelpatrone{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Donnernder Schuss{/g} oder {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Entsetzliche Anordnung{/g}, macht er eine Probe auf Zwang mit einem Abzug von -40. Gelingt die Probe, wird das Ziel gelähmt.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le porteur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} une cible avec {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Coup de bouclier{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double cartouche{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Tir de condamnation{/g} ou {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Verdict sinistre{/g}, il tente un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Intimidation{/g} avec un malus de −40. En cas de réussite, la cible est {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisée{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g}, or {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g}, they make a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −40 penalty. If the wearer succeeds, the target is {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le porteur touche une cible avec {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Coup de bouclier{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double cartouche{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Tir de condamnation{/g} ou {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Verdict sinistre{/g}, il tente un test d'Intimidation avec un malus de −40. En cas de réussite, la cible est immobilisée.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}シールドバッシュ{/g}、{g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}二重の銃弾{/g}、{g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}爆鳴性のショット{/g}、または{g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}不気味な判決{/g}でターゲットを{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}するたびに、−40のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}}強制力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を受けなければならない。使用者がこの判定に成功した場合、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不能{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g}, or {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g}, they make a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −40 penalty. If the wearer succeeds, the target is {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}シールドバッシュ{/g}、{g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}二重の銃弾{/g}、{g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}爆鳴性のショット{/g}、または{g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}不気味な判決{/g}でターゲットを攻撃するたびに、−40のペナルティで強制力判定を受けなければならない。使用者がこの判定に成功した場合、ターゲットは移動不能になる。

使用者が{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}シールドバッシュ{/g}、{g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}二重の銃弾{/g}、{g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}爆鳴性のショット{/g}、または{g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}不気味な判決{/g}でターゲットを攻撃するたびに、−40のペナルティで強制力判定を受けなければならない。使用者がこの判定に成功した場合、ターゲットは移動不能になる。

languages.text: Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по цели с помощью {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Удара щитом{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Двойного выстрела{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Молниеносного выстрела{/g} или {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Сурового вердикта{/g}, персонаж выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Напора{/g} со штрафом −40. В случае успеха цель оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижена{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g}, or {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g}, they make a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −40 penalty. If the wearer succeeds, the target is {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Совершая попадание по цели с помощью {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Удара щитом{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Двойного выстрела{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Молниеносного выстрела{/g} или {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Сурового вердикта{/g}, персонаж выполняет проверку Напора со штрафом −40. В случае успеха цель оказывается обездвижена.

Совершая попадание по цели с помощью {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Удара щитом{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Двойного выстрела{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Молниеносного выстрела{/g} или {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Сурового вердикта{/g}, персонаж выполняет проверку Напора со штрафом −40. В случае успеха цель оказывается обездвижена.
